author: Jan Christensen
content: I know the feeling — the sea will wait for the proper moment to let us know who’s really in charge.

author: Joan
content: That is so funny! Congratulations not just on your escape from hurt, but on your sense of humor

author: Doug Bostrom
content: Whatever you’re doing in the head–pants up, down or off– sitting down is the way to go. A kind of equalizer ðŸ™‚

author: Willy
content:
Same. Very entertaining read. Glad you were fine and the wife didnt kick you from the bunk from the chill of the shower.

I am wondering. Would sleep have been easier if you slept in hammocks? The boat would move about you while you would remain some what motionless.

author: Bonnie K. Aldinger
content: ok, that wasn’t what I expected at all!
